PersonalStatement.text: Thomas Sanford, born on 1973-10-03, is a Male based in Myersside, Greece. He is Single and holds Omani nationality. Currently working at Johnson-Foster.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Wilson, Roberts and Mccullough from 2009 to 2017.
Senior Software Developer at Johnson-Foster, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from University of Portsmouth
Master's in Engineering from Baku State University

PersonalSkills.text: Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys coding personal projects.
